metadata.title: CVE-2013-0253 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The default configuration of Apache Maven 3.0.4, when using Maven Wagon2.1, disables SSL certificate checks, which allows remote attackers tospoof servers via a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmaven3-core-java - 3.0.5-1
maven - 3.0.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: maven package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.5-1').
